entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning and afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
